metadata.title: CVE-2019-19796 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
Yabasic 2.86.2 has a heap-based buffer overflow in myformat in function.cvia a crafted BASIC source file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19796` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

yabasic - 1:2.90.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yabasic package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.90.2-1').
